newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: RESEARCH ALERT -Seoul City net raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT -Seoul City net raised.

text.p: BZW Securities said on Thursday it had upgraded its 1996 net earnings forecast for South Korea's Seoul City Gas Co to 15 billion won from a previous forecast of 13.6 billion.
The net earnings forecast for 1997 was also raised to 17.2 billion won from 16.5 billion, it added.
The securities house said in a report that it had upgraded the utility's earnings due mainly to higher net non-operating income and lower tax rates.
But BZW said it would maintain its "hold" recommendation for the shares because they were trading slightly above the target price of 65,000 won.
"However, with 138,279 shares available, we believe the shares remain attractive for medium to long-term investors," it said.
The shares closed Thursday up 400 won to 68,600.
